abstract: Next year, Yahoo will close smaller offices in the United States and Asia. The biggest cut may be selling the search business to Microsoft.
snippet: Next year, Yahoo will close smaller offices in the United States and Asia. The biggest cut may be selling the search business to Microsoft.
lead_paragraph: Yahoo began laying off 1,500 workers on Wednesday as part of a plan, announced in October, to slash expenses by $400 million a year. The cost cutting, however, may have to go deeper in the coming year.

headline.main: Yahoo Layoffs Today May Not Be the Last

abstract: The drums are beating once again for a deal between Yahoo and Microsoft.
lead_paragraph: The drums are beating once again for a deal between Yahoo and Microsoft.

headline.main: Yahoo Gets Bounce From Renewed Talk of Microsoft
